help: Enter the slider names separated by "|" (e.g. Boobs|Butt|Nose). Make sure there is no leading or trailing space.
Name of the trigger value that is used to determine morphing.
Whether to update immediately, after sleeping, or periodically. Default: Immediately

text--join(<br>): Immediately: Changes morphs the moment a trigger value changes.
Periodically: Checks the trigger value every x seconds (update delay) and changes morphs according to current trigger value.
After sleeping: Every time you go to sleep you get additional morphs according to the current trigger value. In this update mode you can only restore your body by visiting a doctor.

help: At 100% the slider will be the initial value + 1 when you are fully irradiated.
Morphing starts when the trigger value reaches x%
Morphing reaches the target size increase when trigger value reaches x%
Enter slot numbers to unequip when the unequip threshold is reached. Separate multiple slots by "|" (e.g. 10|11|12). Make sure there is no leading or trailing space.
When x% of your morphing target is reached armor from the selected slots will be unequipped.
Applies this slider set to your companions (based on your rads).
With this enabled only doctors can restore your base shape. Reducing the trigger value by other means will have no effect on the sliders.
Enabled: reducing and then increasing the trigger value further increase morphs.
Disabled: Unlimited additive morphing. Use at own risk!
How far additive morphing can exceed the target size increase (% of target size increase). 0 = cannot exceed target; 100 = cannot exceed 2x target

text: Warning! Additive morphing without a limit can lead to insane morphs!
